name: PLEINAIR
description:
CREDITS

Modelling: Anish Krishan
Music: Donny Clark
Everything Else: Tommy

OBJECTIVES

 - Cure all crystals by dropping seeds onto them
 - Try to beat the minimum time!

CONTROLS
Left Mouse: Drop Seed
Right Mouse: Speed Up
R: Restart Level

BUGS
 - Sometimes the next level text will not show causing you to be stuck
